item.title: Someone has been putting litter into this brown bin, 18th August
item.description:
This brown bin is not our bin, as we do not have a garden waste bin at our property (we live in a block of flats). However, someone has brought it here and it has been used as a general waste bin for about 2 weeks as you can see. The rubbish collectors refuse to take it as naturally the waste inside does not correspond to the waste that should be in there. Please could the waste and bin be removed from our property? I am concerned about pests coming into the area and our flat.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92-94, Friary Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous flytipping, 18th August
item.description:
This is disgusting. Everyday people dump rubbish and add to this pile. The amount of street waste, graffiti, open drug taking is increasing. You need to research broken windows theory. When low level crime and civil disobedience is so flagrant

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Aden Grove, Hackney, London
